thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com | 4 of 69
thread.title: Ronald Piaszk
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Ronald Piaszk

author: Ronald Piaszk
title: Ronald Piaszk
text:
Bought a whole house water system with UV light about a year ago. We are on a well and the system works great - pure, clean, soft water. Installed the system myself with guidance from company video's and telephone conversations with tec. department. Broke UV light sleeve on installation. Was sent a replacement - no charge and overnight delivery.
Best on-line experience I have ever had - buy a lot of things on-line. Great customer and technical support. Backs their products 100% and takes care of their customers. Six star rating!
